commit.message:
Auto merge of #52264 - csmoe:kind, r=oli-obk

Rename spanned HIR node enums from Foo_ to FooKind

Closes https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/51968
r? @oli-obk

files.patch:
@@ -330,19 +330,19 @@ impl_stable_hash_for!(struct hir::ExistTy {

-    TyTup(ts),
-    TyPath(qpath),
-    TyTraitObject(trait_refs, lifetime),
-    TyTypeof(body_id),

+                        hir::ExprKind::Match(.., hir::MatchSource::ForLoopDesugar) => "for",
+                        hir::ExprKind::Match(..) => "match",

                     },
